attributes.action: Make CPR training compulsory in secondary schools
attributes.additional_details: If they get taught this in school it could go on to save other people's lives.
attributes.background: My two boys have recently had to administer cpr to their dad who was seriously ill and ended up ventilated in a medically induced coma. Thanks to their quick actions calling the ambulance service who then told them exactly what to do they were able to save their dads life.
